original: 益州建寧人，蜀漢官員。原屬劉璋，劉備入蜀時投靠劉備，隨即又奉命至漢中迎接馬超。後來南中屢次叛亂，李恢每每率兵平亂，立功無數。
text: Yizhou Jianning, Shuhan official. Originally belonged to Liu Zhang, Liu Bei took refuge in Liu Bei when he entered Shu, and was then ordered to Hanzhong to meet Ma Chao. Later, Nanzhong rebelled repeatedly, and Li Hui always led his troops to quell the rebellion and made countless contributions.
